titleStmt.title: 7 Decemb. 1643 it is this day ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliamens, that Master Marshall be desired to preach at Saint Margarets Westminster on Friday come sevenight to those that shall there meet for the taking of the Solemn League and Covenant ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Henry Elsynge, Cler. Pal. D. Com.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
